casebody.data:
EASTON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Petitioner
v.
Rudy MILLER and the Express Times, Respondents No. 530 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 4, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 4 TH day of February, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED to the issue set forth below. Allocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue, as stated by Petitioner is:

Whether the Commonwealth Court erred as a matter of law in determining that the requested video, which depicts children on a school bus during the school day, is not exempt from disclosure under the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act.
